lore: King Croaks are a species of giant frogs found in certain forests and swamps. They're much more intelligent than common frogs and interact with each other in ways similar to chimpanzees. Constant play-fighting is part of their daily life, and the group is led by the individual who commands the most respectâ€”usually the strongest. Leader or not, it's not uncommon to find these creatures for sale on the black market, where it's recently become trendy to outfit them with crowns.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: King Croak
